label: 摂関家
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: The regent's line of the Fujiwara house during Heian times; split into five separate branches (gosekke) during the Kamakura age, with important offices rotating among them.　[五摂家]　[Cf. Mass, 1976.]
